law.catch_line: A licensee shall display a license in the way that the Comptroller requires by regulation....

text.section: A licensee shall display a license in the way that the Comptroller requires by regulation.

A licensee who sells cigarettes through a vending machine:
shall place each package of cigarettes in the machine so that when the package is visible the tax stamps required by § 12-304 of the Tax - General Article are also visible; and
in the way that the Comptroller requires by regulation, shall:
identify each vending machine with a conspicuous label that states the licensee's name, address, and telephone number; and
display on a conspicuous label applicable prohibitions and penalties under § 10-107 of the Criminal Law Article.
